//: This graffiti is generally assumed to come from before the Cataclysm

text.text: <full_name> is the biggest slut in <city>, and I'm damn proud of it!
There is a beautifully drawn graffiti tag on the wall here.
This is a cartoon rendition of an alien.
This is a crudely spray-painted tag adorned with skulls.

I have a secure and loving relationship with your mom and you're going to need to come to terms with that.

Do you want to talk about it?  You know where to find me.  Love you sweety.
<given_name> you fuckin gave me ADES you SHIT.
This is a spray-painted drawing of an angel with wings made of vines.
This is a curious drawing of a roll of toilet paper dissolving into a rainbow.
This is a cartoon rendition of a zombie.
And they walked upon His Earth, and there was a RECKONING, and only the worthy survived
This is a drawing of a zombie with a bullet hole in its head.
This is a surprisingly artistic drawing of a penis.
This is a simple spray-painted graphic of a forest made of bones.
This is a drawing of an alien with a bullet hole in its head.
This is a spray-painting of an anatomically unlikely woman wearing very little.
BIGGEST WASTE OF TAX MONEY FUCK YOU GOVERMINT
This is a simple drawing of a skinny figure wearing an emergency evac jacket and a gas mask.  Scrawled beneath, it says "thanks for the outfit".
Abandon hope, all ye who enter here.
NO ONE IS COMING FOR US
They aren't coming to help, they're coming to clean up
This is a far-too-detailed drawing the inside of an alien craft, in all its biomechanical horror.
This is a quick rendition in permanent marker of an alien craft with war machines spilling out of it.  Underneath, it reads "What did we do to deserve this?"
WE'RE ALL FINE HERE HOW R U
<given_name> I couldn't wait any longer, went to cabin.  Meet me there.  Love <given_name>.
<given_name> I am still looking for you.
